name: PLUM polka dots slouchy hat in ecofriendly llama wool
TURQUIOSE polka dots slouchy hat in ecofriendly llama wool
description:
This hat is a KOIA original design.

POLKA SLOUCHY HAT is definitely a turn around heads hat. Turquoise drops illuminate this sweet peanut butter hat. 2 cute pompoms hang from the side making it unique and fun.
This hat is made in llama wool, in natural camel color. Turquoise details are made in the finest 100% merino wool. It’s soft and gentle - perfect for delicate skins.

Llama wool is a natural fiber remarkably light and 7 times warmer than sheep wool. It repels rain and snow, and comes in an array of natural colors. It’s hypoallergenic and super soft, making it ideal for the young ones.

This hat has been hand-crocheted with llama and merino wool.

**************************************************************
ALSO AVAILABLE IN OTHER COLORS

name: SUPER slouchy hat in ecofriendly llama wool
description:
This hat is a KOIA original design.

POLKA SUPER SLOUCHY HAT is definitely a must, can´t go wrong with it. Takes you to Paris in the first stop. 
Cranberry drops illuminate this sweet chocolate hat. 
This hat is made in llama wool, in natural chocolate color. Deep pink details are made in the finest 100% merino wool. It’s soft and gentle - perfect for delicate skins.

Llama wool is a natural fiber remarkably light and 7 times warmer than sheep wool. It repels rain and snow, and comes in an array of natural colors. It’s hypoallergenic and super soft, making it ideal for the young ones.

This hat has been hand-crocheted with llama and merino wool.
